{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Rocketfish |model=RF-WFD301 |revision= |upc=600603157356 |ean= |asin=B00KCYKMVQ |price=79.99 |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/18/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=miracast receiver, media streamer, computer-on-a-stick |fcc_id=N89-RFWFD301 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=USB Micro-B (female) |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM2835 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27U1G8F2BTR-BC |fla1_num= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H9TKNNN2GDAP |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43236 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=HDMI |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Advanced Miracast Video Receiver}}
[https://www.rocketfishproducts.com/pdp/RF-WFD301/7511057 Product page]
The RAM chip is marked with "hynix", "H9TKNNN2GDAP", and "LRNDM 240A" in the FCC photos. :It is presumed to be a 2Gbit chip.
The BCM43236 is using two [[Skyworks]] ([[SiGe]]) 2577L / SE2577L ICs.
A full view of the back of the board is not available...
The FCC 'manual' shows the default SSID as '''BBY-41-a048'''.
*[http://www.bestbuy.com/site/Rocketfish%26%23153%3B+-+Miracast+Video+Receiver/7511057.p?id=1218851304131&skuId=7511057&st=7511057&cp=1&lp=1 On '''BestBuy''']
